parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the ASK cluster. This parameter is required if the ClusterType parameter is set to ask.

parameters.name: ClusterType
parameters.description: The type of the monitoring object. Valid values: ask , acs , one and ecs.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the Prometheus instance belongs.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: This parameter is required if the ClusterType parameter is set to ecs.
